craft-panel-element.title: Element Material Configuration
craft-panel-element.delete-confirm-info: Are you sure you want to delete this element? This will not remove element assignments already configured.
craft-panel-element.showClass-hint: Only elements matching these categories will be shown in the left elements area. Use commas to separate. If empty, all elements are shown.
craft-panel-element.requirements-hint: Only items that meet these requirements will be shown in the right materials area (you can still drag items from elsewhere into the middle configuration area).
craft-panel-element.requirements-folder-hint: Matches when the item's folder name equals one of these values (comma-separated). Highest priority.
craft-panel-element.requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item's type is included in these values (comma-separated). Lowest priority.
craft-panel-element.requirements-script-hint: Script must return a Boolean. It may reference the variable 'item' to test the item.
craft-panel-element.shape-alter-hint: If the preset shapes are not enough, configure an alternative here using the Font Awesome icon name (solid only) without the 'fa-solid fa-' prefix. For example, for use "burger-cheese".

craft-panel-recipe.title: Configure Recipe
craft-panel-recipe.edit-num-info: If only Use Min is enabled, the recipe only checks whether element amounts meet the minimum (default). If only Use Max is enabled, exceeding the max marks the recipe invalid (useful to forbid certain materials). If both are enabled the amounts must be within the range.
craft-panel-recipe.show-result-hint: If No, the recipe's crafting result won't be shown in the tooltip when hovering the recipe.
craft-panel-recipe.is-locked-hint: Locked recipes will not be displayed and cannot be crafted even if materials match.
craft-panel-recipe.craft-script-hint: Script executed when crafting. Available variables: game,data,panel,actor,recipes,elements,materials,recipe,results,canceled.
craft-panel-recipe.unlock-script-hint: Script must return a Boolean or string. false => remain locked; 'unlock' => unlocked but hidden; 'show' => unlocked and shown. Available variables: actor,recipe,panel.

craft-panel-cook-recipe.title: Select Cooking Recipe
craft-panel-cook-recipe.delete-confirm-info: Are you sure you want to delete this cooking recipe?

craft-panel-blend.title: Blend Panel
craft-panel-blend.is-necessary-hint: If checked, this slot must be filled to craft.
craft-panel-blend.is-consumed-hint: If checked, materials in this slot will be consumed when crafting.
craft-panel-blend.is-locked-hint: If locked, this slot cannot be filled.
craft-panel-blend.unlock-script-hint: Script must return a Boolean. If true, the slot lock is released. Available variables: data,panel,actor,elements,materials.
craft-panel-blend.slot-script-hint: Script must return an object {isNecessary: boolean, isConsumed: boolean}. It can reference data,panel,actor,elements,materials,slotItem.
craft-panel-blend.merge-by-name-hint: If checked, crafted results with the same name will be merged; otherwise a new item is always created.
craft-panel-blend.slot-requirements-hint: Only items matching these requirements can be placed in this slot.
craft-panel-blend.slot-requirements-name-hint: Matches when the item name equals one of these values (highest priority).
craft-panel-blend.slot-requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item type is included in these values (lowest priority).
craft-panel-blend.slot-requirements-script-hint: Script must return Boolean and may reference 'item' to test the item.
craft-panel-blend.panel-requirements-hint: Only items that meet these will be shown in the right materials list (you can still drag items into slots from outside).
craft-panel-blend.panel-requirements-name-hint: Matches when the item name equals one of these values (highest priority).
craft-panel-blend.panel-requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item type is included in these values (lowest priority).
craft-panel-blend.panel-requirements-script-hint: Script must return Boolean and may reference 'item'.
craft-panel-blend.category-requirements-hint: Only items matching these will be shown under that category in the right materials area.
craft-panel-blend.category-requirements-name-hint: Matches when the item name equals one of these values (highest priority).
craft-panel-blend.category-requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item type is included in these values (lowest priority).
craft-panel-blend.category-requirements-script-hint: Script must return Boolean and may reference 'item'.
craft-panel-blend.craft-pre-script-hint: Run before crafting starts. Available vars: data,panel,actor,recipes,elements,materials,canceled.
craft-panel-blend.craft-post-script-hint: Run after crafting completes. Available vars: data,panel,actor,recipes,elements,materials,recipe,results,canceled.
craft-panel-blend.craft-script-hint: Run after results are determined but before items are created. Available vars: data,panel,actor,recipes,elements,materials,recipe,results,canceled.
craft-panel-blend.refresh-script-hint: Run when the UI refreshes (e.g., placing or removing materials). Available vars: data,panel,actor,elements,materials.
craft-panel-blend.unlock-recipe-hint: If checked, the recipe will be unlocked for the player after they craft it for the first time (affects viewing only; does not change lock state).
craft-panel-blend.show-result-hint: If disabled, results are never shown. If enabled, results are shown but multiple possible results display a question mark. 'Question mark' shows a '?' when results exist, otherwise nothing.
craft-panel-blend.position-unlock-hint: If checked, the slot uses absolute positioning and can be moved by XY values; otherwise it uses relative positioning and auto-layout.

craft-panel-cook.title: Cooking Panel
craft-panel-cook.delete-confirm-info: Are you sure you want to delete this craft result? New results will not inherit previous modifications.
craft-panel-cook.is-necessary-hint: If checked, this slot must be filled to craft.
craft-panel-cook.is-consumed-hint: If checked, materials in this slot will be consumed when crafting.
craft-panel-cook.is-locked-hint: If locked, this slot cannot be filled.
craft-panel-cook.unlock-script-hint: Script must return a Boolean. If true, the slot lock is released. Available variables: data,panel,actor,elements,materials.
craft-panel-cook.slot-script-hint: Script must return an object {isNecessary: boolean, isConsumed: boolean}. It can reference data,panel,actor,elements,materials,slotItem.
craft-panel-cook.slot-requirements-hint: Only items matching these requirements can be placed in this slot.
craft-panel-cook.slot-requirements-name-hint: Matches when the item name equals one of these values (highest priority).
craft-panel-cook.slot-requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item type is included in these values (lowest priority).
craft-panel-cook.slot-requirements-script-hint: Script must return Boolean and may reference 'item'.
craft-panel-cook.panel-requirements-hint: Only items that meet these will be shown in the right materials list (you can still drag items into slots from outside).
craft-panel-cook.panel-requirements-name-hint: Matches when the item name equals one of these values (highest priority).
craft-panel-cook.panel-requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item type is included in these values (lowest priority).
craft-panel-cook.panel-requirements-script-hint: Script must return Boolean and may reference 'item'.
craft-panel-cook.category-requirements-hint: Only items matching these will be shown under that category in the right materials area.
craft-panel-cook.category-requirements-name-hint: Matches when the item name equals one of these values (highest priority).
craft-panel-cook.category-requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item type is included in these values (lowest priority).
craft-panel-cook.category-requirements-script-hint: Script must return Boolean and may reference 'item'.
craft-panel-cook.craft-pre-script-hint: Run before crafting starts. Available vars: data,panel,actor,modifiers,elements,materials,canceled.
craft-panel-cook.craft-post-script-hint: Run after crafting completes. Available vars: data,panel,actor,modifiers,elements,materials,results,canceled.
craft-panel-cook.craft-script-hint: Run after results are determined but before items are created. Available vars: data,panel,actor,modifiers,elements,materials,results,canceled.
craft-panel-cook.refresh-script-hint: Run when the UI refreshes (e.g., placing or removing materials). Available vars: data,panel,actor,elements,materials.
craft-panel-cook.modifier-limit-hint: Set the maximum number of modifiers selectable per craft. 0 means unlimited.
craft-panel-cook.position-unlock-hint: If checked, the slot uses absolute positioning and can be moved by XY values; otherwise it uses relative positioning and auto-layout.
craft-panel-cook.base-cost-hint: Base points available even when no elements are present.
craft-panel-cook.cost-element-hint: Set the element id used as points. If set, available points will include that element's amount.
craft-panel-cook.cost-script-hint: Executed at initialization and each time a material is placed. Must return a number overriding the final available points. Available vars: data,panel,actor,modifiers,elements,materials,baseCost,elementCost,cost.
craft-panel-cook.limit-num-hint: If set, this category's modifiers can be selected at most this many times. 0 means unlimited.
craft-panel-cook.auto-quantity-hint: If checked, crafted result quantity is automatically computed from materials' weight divided by this value, floored, minimum 1.

craft-panel-modifier.title: Configure Modifier
craft-panel-modifier.edit-num-info: If only Use Min is enabled, the modifier only checks if element counts meet the minimum (default). If only Use Max is enabled, exceeding max marks it invalid. If both enabled, counts must be within range.
craft-panel-modifier.auto-apply-hint: If checked, the modifier will be auto-selected when conditions are met and cannot be deselected.
craft-panel-modifier.as-ae-hint: Create configured modifier as an Active Effect on the product rather than modifying the product data directly. 'Merge' merges with other merged modifiers using the product's name and icon. 'Separate' creates a separate AE with modifier name and icon.
craft-panel-modifier.ae-name-hint: Used only when creating a separate Active Effect.
craft-panel-modifier.is-locked-hint: A locked modifier cannot be selected even if materials match.
craft-panel-modifier.unlock-script-hint: Script must return Boolean or string. false => cannot select; 'unlock' => unlocked but still needs other conditions; true => selectable regardless. Available vars: actor,modifier,panel.

craft-panel-forge.title: Forge Panel
craft-panel-forge.delete-confirm-info: Are you sure you want to delete this craft result? New results will not inherit previous modifications.
craft-panel-forge.result-limit-hint: When multiple results are configured, set how many can be chosen. 0 means unlimited.
craft-panel-forge.is-necessary-hint: If checked, this slot must be filled to craft.
craft-panel-forge.is-consumed-hint: If checked, materials in this slot will be consumed when crafting.
craft-panel-forge.is-locked-hint: If locked, this slot cannot be filled.
craft-panel-forge.unlock-script-hint: Script must return a Boolean. If true, the slot lock is released. Available variables: data,panel,actor,elements,materials.
craft-panel-forge.slot-script-hint: Script must return an object {isNecessary: boolean, isConsumed: boolean}. It can reference data,panel,actor,elements,materials,slotItem.
craft-panel-forge.slot-requirements-hint: Only items matching these requirements can be placed in this slot.
craft-panel-forge.slot-requirements-name-hint: Matches when the item name equals one of these values (highest priority).
craft-panel-forge.slot-requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item type is included in these values (lowest priority).
craft-panel-forge.slot-requirements-script-hint: Script must return Boolean and may reference 'item'.
craft-panel-forge.panel-requirements-hint: Only items that meet these will be shown in the right materials list (you can still drag items into slots from outside).
craft-panel-forge.panel-requirements-name-hint: Matches when the item name equals one of these values (highest priority).
craft-panel-forge.panel-requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item type is included in these values (lowest priority).
craft-panel-forge.panel-requirements-script-hint: Script must return Boolean and may reference 'item'.
craft-panel-forge.category-requirements-hint: Only items matching these will be shown under that category in the right materials area.
craft-panel-forge.category-requirements-name-hint: Matches when the item name equals one of these values (highest priority).
craft-panel-forge.category-requirements-type-hint: Matches when the item type is included in these values (lowest priority).
craft-panel-forge.category-requirements-script-hint: Script must return Boolean and may reference 'item'.
craft-panel-forge.craft-pre-script-hint: Run before crafting starts. Available vars: data,panel,actor,modifiers,elements,materials,canceled.
craft-panel-forge.craft-post-script-hint: Run after crafting completes. Available vars: data,panel,actor,modifiers,elements,materials,results,canceled.
craft-panel-forge.craft-script-hint: Run after results are determined but before items are created. Available vars: data,panel,actor,modifiers,elements,materials,results,canceled.
craft-panel-forge.refresh-script-hint: Run when the UI refreshes (e.g., placing or removing materials). Available vars: data,panel,actor,elements,materials.
craft-panel-forge.modifier-limit-hint: Set the maximum number of modifiers selectable per craft. 0 means unlimited.
craft-panel-forge.position-unlock-hint: If checked, the slot uses absolute positioning and can be moved by XY values; otherwise it uses relative positioning and auto-layout.
craft-panel-forge.base-cost-hint: Base points available even when no elements are present.
craft-panel-forge.cost-element-hint: Set the element id used as points. If set, available points will include that element's amount.
craft-panel-forge.cost-script-hint: Executed at initialization and each time a material is placed. Must return a number overriding the final available points. Available vars: data,panel,actor,modifiers,elements,materials,baseCost,elementCost,cost.
craft-panel-forge.limit-num-hint: If set, this category's modifiers can be selected at most this many times. 0 means unlimited.

edit-element-config.title: Edit Element
edit-element-config.ids-hint: Shows the element ids. Use commas to configure multiple ids.
edit-element-config.name: Name
edit-element-config.name-hint: Default name shown when quantity is 0.
edit-element-config.img-hint: Default icon shown when quantity is 0.
edit-element-config.color-hint: Default color shown when quantity is 0.
edit-element-config.use-min-hint: If checked, the element amount will not go below the minimum.
edit-element-config.value-hint: Value per point used for sorting elements in the materials panel. Default 0.
edit-element-config.min-hint: Minimum value for the element. If Use Min is checked, amount won't go below this.
edit-element-config.use-max-hint: If checked, the element amount will not exceed the maximum.
edit-element-config.max-hint: Maximum value for the element. If Use Max is checked, amount won't exceed this.
edit-element-config.multi-show-hint: How to display name/icon when multiple ids are configured.
edit-element-config.multi-value-hint: How to compute value when multiple ids are configured.
edit-element-config.plus-elements-hint: Comma-separated ids that will be added to the final result if their original value is non-zero (after multi-value processing). Useful for wildcard elements.
edit-element-config.minus-elements-hint: Comma-separated ids that will be subtracted from the final result if their original value is non-zero (after multi-value processing).

notification.must-fill-necessary-slot: All necessary slots must be filled
notification.must-choose-at-least-one-result: You must choose at least one result
notification.must-fill-at-least-one-result: At least one result slot must be filled
notification.script-error: Your script has an error. Check the console (F12) for details.
notification.tableItemNotFound: Item not found in roll table

settings.quantityPath-hint: The data path for item quantity starting from 'system' (e.g. 'system.itemQuantity.value').
settings.weightPath-hint: The data path for item weight starting from 'system' (e.g. 'system.itemWeight.value'). Used for auto-quantity in cooking.
settings.descriptionPath-hint: The data path for item description starting from 'system' (e.g. 'system.text').
settings.debug-hint: When enabled debug messages will be printed to the console.
settings.customItemColorScript-hint: Provide JS code that receives 'item' and returns a color string. Example: return item.type === 'weapon' ? '#ff0000' : '#00ff00';
